onboarding2.title: Book your own photographer

userType.question: How do you want to use the app?

auth.step_away: You're one step away from the perfect event
auth.reset_password_instruction: Please enter the email associated with your account to reset your password
auth.reset_password_description: Enter a new password for your account. Make sure it’s strong and easy to remember.

terms.body_1: "We" refers to the application that connects clients with event service providers. "You" refers to the user, whether a client or a service provider.
terms.body_2: The app allows users to browse, filter, and book services such as venues, catering, decoration, photography, transportation, and more — all in one place.
terms.body_3: You must provide accurate information when creating an account and are responsible for any activity under your account.
terms.body_4: Misuse of the app, including posting offensive or misleading content, is prohibited. Please respect all users.
terms.body_5: The app facilitates booking tools, but the final agreement is between you and the service provider. We are not responsible for any disputes.
terms.body_6: We only provide the platform and do not guarantee the quality of services. Any issues are between the user and the provider.
terms.body_7: Policies vary by provider. Please review them before confirming your booking.
terms.body_8: We reserve the right to update the terms at any time. You will be notified of significant changes through the app.
terms.body_9: To reach us, please use the "Contact Us" section within the app.
